title: Targeted Pseudorandom Generators, Simulation Advice Generators, and Derandomizing Logspace
timeline: Manuscript posted online in October 2016; appeared at STOC in June 2017.
version-notes: The STOC proceedings version and the arXiv version are the same except for formatting.

errata.text: In Lemma 2, the space complexity should be \(O(s + \log w + \log(1/\delta) + \log(1/\gamma))\). That is, there is a missing \(O(\log(1/\delta))\) term in the lemma statement. This does not affect anything else in the paper.

recognition: The paper was invited to the SICOMP special issue for STOC 2017.
Oded Goldreich wrote a blog post that mentions the paper.
